bug.short_desc: dnf "autoremove" command has no description in dnf --help

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: dnf "autoremove" command has no description in dnf --help
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): dnf --version 1.1.7 Installés : dnf-0:1.1.7-2.fc23.noarch à 2016-03-17 07:37 Compilé : Fedora Project à 2016-03-09 16:45
Installés : rpm-0:4.13.0-0.rc1.12.fc23.x86_64 à 2016-03-06 06:54 Compilé : Fedora Project à 2016-02-29 09:53
Note : problem is the same with dnf 1.1.6-2.fc24, as we are working on F24, I assumed it would be better to target F24
How reproducible: always (F23 & F24)
Steps to Reproduce: 1. dnf --help | grep autoremove
Actual results: no string describe what it does
Expected results: a short description of the command
Thanks for your help !
dnf-plugins-core-0.1.21-1.fc24 dnf-1.1.9-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-1efd7bc386
